issue.title: www.youtube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Up06CryWQpE](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DUp06CryWQpE) ### Comment Username: @Grandpat-Star > When I try to watch the official music video for Strawberry Wine by Deana Carter Official the adblock has not worked since last night. I have tried reloading and ads show up. When I have tried reloading other videos such as Introducing LEGO Braille Bricks Play with Braille by Lego official, and the official audio for The Wrong Girl (Greatest Hits Version) by Lee Ann Womack Official the ads are not there. This seems to be contained to this specific video. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ghclp6szi9s0c8woscogs0w80og0ggsds7aguah22o.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/tfx68g4v7tw4wkkg0g0s44go0o88sc4dmcps04vezs.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.57 Browser: | Firefox Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion Other extensions used: | Duck Duck Go Privacy Essentials, Return Youtube Disklike Button, Youtube-shorts block, CustomTube, and Replace Youtube's Home with Subscriptions

issue.title: kaoskrew.org

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.14

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances  pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://kaoskrew.org/viewtopic.php?p=30386&sid=f2ab70ceb692db31a9a8aacef6f4cfd2#p30386

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>Click on anywhere on the page and there will be a popup. 

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![1](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/29574622/db6a97f9-55e5-43a9-9f99-9395a8c8af14)


</details>



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.2.151

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.nytimes.com/2023/08/26/business/economy/us-economy-china.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>I also use "Bypass Paywalls Clean filter". But when Adguard Tracking Protection filter is used, the paywall can not be unlocked. Adg tracking is breaking the functionality of Bypass Paywalls Clean filter.
2. It seems this rule `nytimes.com#%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "Navigator.prototype.joinParakeetInterestGroup", "noopFunc")` is the culprit. Creating an unblock/allow rule for this one makes the page show the full article. Please do something to make ADG tracking compatible with Bypass Paywall Clean filter in this case. 

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/29574622/fa2ebb11-9bd4-4b3f-bbe4-1ca627c559ed)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Cosmetic rules (element hiding, scriptlets and JavaScript rules)  are not displayed in the filtering log in apps, there is opened task about it - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/CoreLibs/issues/180
Additional information - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/CoreLibs/issues/1784#issuecomment-1649284401
